message: I have a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a competitive price considering the product's worth to you.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay closer to $9,000.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit on this deal. I can do $11,000, which is still a good deal for you considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate you working with me on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?  That's a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate the suggestion, but I'm not quite ready to meet in the middle just yet. I can do $11,500, which is still a great deal for you considering the product's value to you.
Alice, I'm getting close to my limit. I can go up to $10,250, but that's really as high as I can go.
